Module JTrashFX
Package application.model.player

Class Player

java.lang.Object
application.model.player.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
Npc, User
public abstract class Player extends Object
Abstract class to extend to get the methods to handle the game
Author:
Luigi Pennisi

    • cardIsOut

      public boolean cardIsOut(Carta card)
      This method checks if the card is playable
      Parameters:
      card - Is the card to check
      Returns:
      true when the card is bigger than the player remaining cards number but not a jolly or king
